General.Name: ShaMaran Petroleum Corp
General.Description: ShaMaran Petroleum Corp., together with its subsidiaries, develops and produces oil and gas properties. It holds interest in the Atrush Block production sharing contract in the Kurdistan region of Iraq; and in the Sarsang Production Sharing Contract in Kurdistan. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 885 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3E8
